name: Not the End (Piroporopi)
description:
This "game" is an interactive story about a young girl confronted to a very mysterious death. She sets on a personal quest to understand what happend and why.

!!!!!!!! There is no game (sad sad noise) only an intro cinematic !!!!!!!!!

As always in jams there is a gap between the goal and the final product, this time more than ever! Yet it was a nice experience to conceptualize and build this story, the missing scenes are in the good hands of Blender, waiting for a potential potentiality of (maybe) getting into the game.

Gallery of potentialities:

Music credit: Yomawari ost

Participation to GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022
